tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EventAttendees (
  attendee_id INT,
  event_id INT,
  attendee_name VARCHAR(255),
  registration_date DATE,
  ticket_type VARCHAR(50),
  PRIMARY KEY (attendee_id, event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS attendees (
    attendee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100),
    event_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(100),
    category VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE AttendeeBehavior (
    behavior_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_id INT,
    event_id INT,
    behavior_type VARCHAR(255),
    behavior_data TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (attendee_id) REFERENCES Attendees(attendee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES Events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE attendees (
    attendee_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_name VARCHAR(50),
    age INTEGER,
    email VARCHAR(100),
    registration_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE events (
    event_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(50),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE event_attendance (
    attendance_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INTEGER REFERENCES events(event_id),
    attendee_id INTEGER REFERENCES attendees(attendee_id),
    check_in_time TIMESTAMP,
    check_out_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Attendees (
    attendee_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    last_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Events (
    event_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    end_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE EventInteractions (
    interaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    attendee_id INT REFERENCES Attendees(attendee_id),
    event_id INT REFERENCES Events(event_id),
    interaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    interaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
